survey_properties.intro_message: Please rate all the items and do so honestly; do not worry about your answer because there are no right or wrong ones. Thank you very much for your collaboration. If you have never experienced the situation described, please imagine what your level of UNEASE, STRESS, or NERVOUSNESS might be if you were in that situation and rate how you imagine you would feel by placing an “X” on the corresponding number.
survey_properties.end_message: Thank you for your honest answers.

questions.question_title: 1. Greeting someone and being ignored
choices: Not at all or very Slight

questions.question_title: 2. Having to ask a neighbour to stop making noise
choices: Not at all or very Slight

questions.question_title: 3. Speaking in Public
choices: Not at all or very Slight

choices: Not at all or very Slight

choices: Not at all or very Slight

choices: Not at all or very Slight

choices: Not at all or very Slight
